properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 7:18PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Alabama River At Montgomery...
...The flood warning continues for the Alabama River At R.F. Henry
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Alabama River at Selma...

.Rises continue along the Alabama River...and a flood warning remains
in effect at Montgomery...R.F. Henry Lock and Dam...and Selma.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Alabama River At Selma.
* until further notice...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT  6:00 PM Thursday the stage was 46.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 45.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 48.8 feet by
Monday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 48 feet...Flooding occurs inland to between Johnson
Street and Old Montgomery Road in Selmont. Portions of Bloch Park
and the Selma Country Club begin to flood. Widespread flooding of
farm and pasturelands in the area will continue.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
